mapper.select: SELECT WCP.id, WCP.username, WCP.phone, WCP.email, WCP.company, WCP.handle, WCP.plan_name AS planName, WCP.contact_reason AS contactReason, DATE_FORMAT(WCP.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createTime FROM WEB_CONTACT_PLAN WCP WCP.plan_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}), '%') ORDER BY WCP.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT WC.ID id, WC.CONTENT_TITLE planName, (select count(*) from WEB_COLLECTION COL where COL.source_id=WC.ID AND COL.source_type=1) colCount, (select count(*) from WEB_THUMB WT where WT.source_id=WC.ID AND WT.source_type=1) thumbCount, DATE_FORMAT(WC.CREATED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createTime FROM WEB_CONTENT WC WHERE WC.CONTENT_TEMPLATEID=#{templateId} AND WC.CONTENT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}), '%') ORDER BY WC.CREATED_TIME DESC
